component.name: The Legend of Zelda - Return of the Hylian SE
component.summary: A remake of the original Zelda Return of the Hylian, a short and pleasant fangame from Vincent Jouillat

description.p: Zelda Return of the Hylian Solarus Edition is a remake of the original Zelda Return of the Hylian, a short and pleasant fangame from Vincent Jouillat. The original game was developed in C++ and was released in 2006.
This new version was developed with the Solarus engine by Christopho, Mymy and Vincent Jouillat. While this is essentially the same game, a lot of details were improved thanks to the use of Solarus
